original: 對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>成功行訛言惑眾之計，該據點民怨上升<color=#bceea7>$num1點</color>，將逐步引發暴亂！(<color=#bceea7>訛言惑眾 成功</color>)
text: Successfully misrepresented <color=#bceea7>$city1</color>, and public grievances in the base rose by <color=#bceea7>$num1 points</color>, which will gradually lead to riots! (<color=#bceea7>Success by misleading the crowd</color>)
